import NavBar from '../../Components/Navbar/NavBar' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import "./Home.css" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { fetchUser } from '../../Features/User' import { fetchProduts } from '../../Features/Products' import Axios, { ImagePath } from '../../Axios' function Home() { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchProduts()) dispatch(fetchUser()) }, [dispatch]) const {Products,} = useSelector(state => state.products) var history = useNavigate(); function findProductType(id) { history('/shop/' + id) } return (
findProductType('vegetables')}> Vegtables
findProductType('fruits')}> Fruits
Sweets
idonow
{ Products.map(product => { return (
Orange
60 kg
) }) }
) } export default Home
